description: Athletic, boyish Kurt and fit, slender Blake are both looking forward to getting some action today, and they definitely aren’t shy about it. “He’s got a really nice ass,” says Kurt. “He’s got a really nice dick,” replies Blake. “I like how tall he is. I’m kind of in a dominating mood, but I’m also in a bottoming mood. It’s this weird combo. I want to be a dominating bottom,” explains Blake. “A bossy bottom. I just love his ass. Please stand up!” demands Kurt, as he takes a nice peak. It’s a match made in heaven for this top and bottom duo!
title: Kurt & Blake : Bareback
